dict.acceptation: 文学；文学作品；文献；著作；

sent.orig: Hospital library information resource construction included paper based literature, database based literature and network based literature.
sent.trans: 医院图书馆信息资源建设包括印刷型文献、数字型文献和网络文献三个方面。

sent.orig: Jost, F. Introduction to Comparative Literature. Trans. Liao Hongjun. Changsha: Hunan Art and Literature Press, 1988.
sent.trans: 弗？约斯特：《比较文学导论》，廖鸿均译。长沙：湖南文艺出版社，1988年。

sent.orig: Literature is not a grand game for specialized services, literature runs through them is another industry.
sent.trans: 盛大文学不是专门为游戏服务的，文学贯穿的是另外一条产业。

sent.orig: The Chinese ancient literature has the special features only in long gallery literature of the world.
sent.trans: 中国古代文学在世界文学长廊中是独具特色的，具有明显的审美性特征。

sent.orig: Literature and art for the landlord class are feudal literature and art.
sent.trans: 文艺是为地主阶级的，这是封建主义的文艺。
